WorkItem.Description:
When installing the Prism.Source I get a ' the file name you specified is not valid or too long'. I narrowed down the issue to the path of a single file:
D:\Documents and Settings\Siderite.SIFOR\My Documents\Visual Studio 2008\Projects\Prism\Quickstarts\UI Composition\UIComposition.Tests.AcceptanceTest\UIComposition.Tests.AcceptanceTest\TestInfrastructure\DataProvider\ModuleDataProviders\EmployeeDataProvider.cs
which is longer than the MAX_PATH constant for Windows XP (260 characters) and results in all kinds of issues.
Â 
I've solved the issue by renaming the file to something smaller, but I think the issue lies with the folder structure.
WorkItem.Summary: Path too deep (file name too long)

Comments.Message:
This issue is also added in this link. You can vote here to centralize the votes:
http://compositewpf.codeplex.com/WorkItem/View.aspx?WorkItemId=4080

Try installing and doing most of your Visual Studio work from a path closer to your drive root.  By taking the default "D:\Documents and Settings\Siderite.SIFOR\My Documents\Visual Studio 2008\Projects" your are automatically wasting a lot of characters.  I use C:\VSProjects.
